General.Name: Ledlink Optics
General.Description: Ledlink Optics, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells optics for lighting companies and other LED manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include waterproof, color mixing, and windowsill lens; V-CUT series, ultra-thin hybrid lens, and zoom lens; linear lens; and head and tail lamps, lateral linear lens, daytime running lights, reading lamps, and motorcycle head lamps, as well as automotive lighting equipment and other products. Its products are used in automotive, architectural, landscape, commercial, street, industrial, indoor, and color mixing applications. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 655, Bannan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
